s_synopsis: Agency operatives Gabe Logan and Lian Xing discover that a plot to sell off the deadly Syphon Filter virus stems from within their own organization. As they attempt to expose the conspirators and prevent the sale, the Agency responds by alerting military and police forces that Logan and Xing must be eliminated... The two agents must strike with deadly efficiency. And with the threat of a bio-weapon disaster looming, the destiny of millions lies in their hands.
